content:
Hi all,

We get the medication info from the Claims data and i would like to denote if the medication was dispensed through a Pharmacy setting or administered at the clinic.

Should i use the MD.category with a local code system if it's from a Pharmacy or create an extension?
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-medicationdispense-category.html (inpatient, outpatient, discharge, community)

Please let me know your thoughts on this. Thank you.

@Melva Peters, @Lloyd McKenzie .
